languages.text: "Ты этого не видишь, {name}, но... само поле боя. Стычки кабалов — не то же, что рейды на миры мон-кай. Я могу сколько угодно рисовать в голове векторы атаки, расположение отрядов и прочее... Нет, не складывается. Не складывается". {n}Ксенос перебирает пальцами в явном раздражении.{/n}

"You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ты этого не видишь, {name}, но... само поле боя. Стычки кабалов — не то же, что рейды на миры мон-кай. Я могу сколько угодно рисовать в голове векторы атаки, расположение отрядов и прочее... Нет, не складывается. Не складывается". {n}Ксенос перебирает пальцами в явном раздражении.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is. The Kabal clashes are different from the raids against the worlds of the mon-keigh. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on.... But it does make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos is twiddling his fingers in obvious annoyance.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is. The Kabal clashes are different from the raids against the worlds of the mon-keigh. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on.... But it does make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos is twiddling his fingers in obvious annoyance.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ihr könnt das nicht sehen, {name}, doch ... das Schlachtfeld selbst ist merkwürdig. Kämpfe zwischen Kabalen sind anders als Angriffe auf Chem-Pan-Sey-Welten. Ich kann in meinem Kopf Angriffsvektoren ziehen, so viel ich will, mir die Positionen der Trupps ansehen und so weiter ... doch es ergibt keinen Sinn. Nichts an dieser Sache ergibt Sinn." {n}Der Xenos biegt offenkundig sehr gereizt seine Finger durch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt das nicht sehen, {name}, doch ... das Schlachtfeld selbst ist merkwürdig. Kämpfe zwischen Kabalen sind anders als Angriffe auf Chem-Pan-Sey-Welten. Ich kann in meinem Kopf Angriffsvektoren ziehen, so viel ich will, mir die Positionen der Trupps ansehen und so weiter ... doch es ergibt keinen Sinn. Nichts an dieser Sache ergibt Sinn." {n}Der Xenos biegt offenkundig sehr gereizt seine Finger durch.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你看不到这些，{name}，但是……这个战场本身就非常奇怪。阴谋团之间的冲突，与袭击猴子的世界截然不同。我可以随心所欲地在脑海中描绘攻击的方向，思考小队的位置……但眼前的这一切根本没有道理，完全说不通通。”{n}玛拉斋带着明显的恼怒，活动了一下手指。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你看不到这些，{name}，但是……这个战场本身就非常奇怪。阴谋团之间的冲突，与袭击猴子的世界截然不同。我可以随心所欲地在脑海中描绘攻击的方向，思考小队的位置……但眼前的这一切根本没有道理，完全说不通通。”{n}玛拉斋带着明显的恼怒，活动了一下手指。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous ne pouvez pas le voir, {name}, mais... le champ de bataille lui-même est étrange. Les affrontements entre Kabales sont différents des raids sur les mondes mon-keigh. J'ai beau imaginer les vecteurs d'attaque, visualiser les emplacements des escouades... le résultat n'a ni queue ni tête. Tout ceci est absurde. » {n}Le xénos plie et déplie ses phalanges, manifestement irrité.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous ne pouvez pas le voir, {name}, mais... le champ de bataille lui-même est étrange. Les affrontements entre Kabales sont différents des raids sur les mondes mon-keigh. J'ai beau imaginer les vecteurs d'attaque, visualiser les emplacements des escouades... le résultat n'a ni queue ni tête. Tout ceci est absurde. » {n}Le xénos plie et déplie ses phalanges, manifestement irrité.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No puedes verlo, {name}, pero... el mismo campo de batalla es extraño. Los combates entre Kábalas son muy distintos a las incursiones contra mundos mon-keigh. Puedo trazar todos los vectores de ataque que quiera mentalmente, imaginar las posiciones de las escuadras y demás... pero no tiene sentido. Nada de esto tiene sentido». {n}El xenos aprieta las manos, visiblemente irritado.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No puedes verlo, {name}, pero... el mismo campo de batalla es extraño. Los combates entre Kábalas son muy distintos a las incursiones contra mundos mon-keigh. Puedo trazar todos los vectores de ataque que quiera mentalmente, imaginar las posiciones de las escuadras y demás... pero no tiene sentido. Nada de esto tiene sentido». {n}El xenos aprieta las manos, visiblemente irritado.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前にはわからないよ、{name}。だが…まさにその戦場がおかしいんだ。陰謀団たちの衝突はモン＝ケイの世界の襲撃とは違っている。俺様は頭の中で好きなだけの攻撃ベクトルを描くことができるんだ。隊の配置や他のことをイメージして…だが、理解できない。何ひとつ理解できない」{n}異種族は明らかに苛立った様子で指を曲げる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「お前にはわからないよ、{name}。だが…まさにその戦場がおかしいんだ。陰謀団たちの衝突はモン＝ケイの世界の襲撃とは違っている。俺様は頭の中で好きなだけの攻撃ベクトルを描くことができるんだ。隊の配置や他のことをイメージして…だが、理解できない。何ひとつ理解できない」{n}異種族は明らかに苛立った様子で指を曲げる。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Sen göremiyorsun {name} ama bu savaş alanı tuhaf. Kaballar arasındaki çatışmalar, mon-keigh dünyalarındaki baskınlardan farklıdır. Kafamda istediğim kadar saldırı vektörü çizeyim, manga konumlarını istediğim kadar canlandırayım, hiçbir mantığa oturtamıyorum. Hiçbir şey mantığa oturmuyor." {n}Zeno, açık bir öfkeyle parmaklarını büküyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You cannot see it, {name}, but... the very battlefield is strange. Clashes between Kabals are different from raids on mon-keigh worlds. I can draw attack vectors in my head as much as I want, picture the squad locations and so on... but it does not make sense. Nothing about this makes sense." {n}The xenos flexes his fingers in obvious irritation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Sen göremiyorsun {name} ama bu savaş alanı tuhaf. Kaballar arasındaki çatışmalar, mon-keigh dünyalarındaki baskınlardan farklıdır. Kafamda istediğim kadar saldırı vektörü çizeyim, manga konumlarını istediğim kadar kafamda canlandırayım, hiçbir mantığa oturtamıyorum. Hiçbir şey mantığa oturmuyor." {n}Zeno açık bir öfkeyle parmaklarını büküyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
